mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Persona (nombre, apellidoPaterno, apellidoMaterno, correo, CURP) VALUES (#{nombre}, #{apellidoPaterno}, #{apellidoMaterno}, #{correo}, #{CURP});
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(id) as last_id FROM Persona;
mapper.update: UPDATE Persona SET nombre = #{nombre}, apellidoPaterno = #{apellidoPaterno}, apellidoMaterno = #{apellidoMaterno}, correo = #{correo}, CURP = #{CURP} WHERE id = #{idPersona};
UPDATE Persona SET foto=#{foto} WHERE id=#{id}
